name: hin_decoder_return_html
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool hull_id_boat_hin_decoder.
Tool description: Decode the 12 digit HIN and check if it is valid. HINDecoder is used by many State DMV's and has been running for 7+ years.
API description: Decodes a Hull Identification Number (HIN) for a boat using the HIN decoder API and returns the result as either JSON or HTML.

hin.description: The Hull Identification Number to be decoded.

usertable.description: If set to '1', the function returns an HTML table instead of JSON. Defaults to '1'.
